name: MS그림판
prompt_block: intentionally crude MS Paint style digital drawing, slightly pixelated edges, basic geometric shapes for characters, flat primary colors with paint bucket fill, no anti-aliasing feel, simple mouse-drawn lines, retro computer art aesthetic, white or solid background, humorous low-fi quality, 90s internet art vibe
description: 옛날 그림판으로 그린 듯한 픽셀 느낌
